name: Sex Dice - Play love games with your beloved
name_original: Sex Dice - Play love games with your beloved
description:
#1 TOP RELATIONSHIP IMPROVING APP IN THE USA WITH MORE THAN 1,000,000 DOWNLOADS!

Sex dice is a dice game intended to heighten the atmosphere and promote foreplay. Add player names, chose their sex orientation and play... with your girlfriend or at a party, this app gives you a chance to play with many people at once, similar to playing 'spin the bottle' game :)

Different erotic level gives of each place/action gives you far better start of your game. Just increase it when you feel ready!

Add players with different sexual orientation
Custom places
Custom actions
